def_cn: 分裂主义的;独立主义的
def_en: Separatist organizations and activities within a country involve members of a group of people who want to establish their own separate government or are trying to do so.

def_cn: 分裂主义者;独立主义者
def_en: Separatists are people who want their own separate government or are involved in separatist activities.
